title: Middle East Crisis: Israeli Military Says It Killed Top Hezbollah Leader
content: Hashem Safieddine was widely seen as a potential successor to his cousin, Hassan Nasrallah, the armed group’s former leader whom Israel also killed in September. There was no immediate confirmation from Hezbollah.
